question_stem.en: A 55-year-old man is immediately brought to the hospital after experiencing a sudden collapse at home 20 minutes ago. The patient reported chest pain and then collapsed to the floor while trying to sit down. Medical history is significant for type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypertension. Temperature is 36.7 C (98.1 F), blood pressure is 80/50 mm Hg, pulse is 120/min, and respirations are 22/min. On examination, the patient is in marked respiratory distress. Bilateral crackles are present. An S3 is audible. ECG reveals ST-segment elevation in leads V2 through V6. {{exhibit_1}}
question_stem.zh: 一名55岁男性在20分钟前在家中突然晕倒后立即被送往医院。患者报告有胸痛，然后试图坐下时倒在地上。病史提示2型糖尿病和高血压。体温36.7°C (98.1°F)，血压80/50 mmHg，脉搏120次/分钟，呼吸22次/分钟。体格检查显示患者有明显的呼吸窘迫。存在双侧啰音。可闻及S3奔马律。心电图显示V2至V6导联ST段抬高。{{exhibit_1}}

question.en: Which of the following hemodynamic changes are most likely present in this patient?
question.zh: 该患者最有可能出现以下哪种血流动力学改变？

summary.en: This question tests knowledge of hemodynamic changes in cardiogenic shock following myocardial infarction, specifically focusing on pulmonary capillary wedge pressure, central venous pressure, and coronary perfusion pressure. The key to solving this question is to recognize the signs and symptoms of cardiogenic shock (hypotension, pulmonary edema, S3) and understand how LV failure affects preload and afterload, ultimately impacting hemodynamic parameters.
summary.zh: 本题考察对心肌梗死后心源性休克血流动力学变化的理解，重点关注肺毛细血管楔压、中心静脉压和冠状动脉灌注压。解决此题的关键是识别心源性休克的体征和症状（低血压、肺水肿、S3），并理解左室衰竭如何影响前负荷和后负荷，最终影响血流动力学参数。
